name: Trading Support Engineer (relocation)
description:
Exness was founded in 2008 and specializes in providing services for trading in the financial markets. We are a Fin-tech company. In the past few years, we have developed at an impressive rate and are recognized today as the top-5 largest brokers in the world.

Today are rapidly growing: 1000+ employees by more than 70 nationalities. Exness was honoured at the 13th IN Business Awards with the Best Workplace / Employer award! The reason for the nomination is our incredible leadership team, which drives and constitutes the company culture and ensures that employees, their wellbeing, and that of their families are at the core of this business. Our culture allows each employee to be the best version of themselves, constantly increasing their expertise. Some of our key values are Ethics & integrity + a Smart scientific approach by creating our own scientific and algorithmic-led product.

The Market Making operations team within Exness combines unique expertise, knowledge and responsibilities to continuously improve pricing, execution models and trading experience of our clients. We are looking for Trading Support Engineer in pricing models to be responsible for running and changing trading platform data based on the market conditions and clients behaviour.

As a source of unique knowledge and experience, the Trading Support Engineer in pricing models plays crucial role in collaboration between teams and helps to achieve ambitious goals together.

What are we looking for:

  • Over 5 years experience working with brokerage trading platforms
  • Experience in pricing models creation and configuration
  • Experience in setting up monitoring and alerting mechanisms
  • Comprehensive knowledge of spot forex, CFDs & OTC products
  • Understanding of B2C and B2B clients requirements and needs
  • Passion for knowledge, technologies and sophisticated systems
  • Strong written and verbal communication English language skills
  • Acting as a team player

An advantage would be:

  • Solid programming skills
  • Math/Statistical analysis/research background
  • Knowledge of FIX, API connectivity protocols

What you will be doing:

  • Monitoring vital metrics, ensuring pricing and execution mechanisms are performing well
  • Identifying anomalies in pricing and execution and proposing solutions to resolve
  • Resolving complicated inquiries related to the pricing model and execution process
  • Working hand to hand with the risk and development teams to respond to urgent requests in a timely manner
  • Providing expert knowledge support to colleagues

We offer: ​

  • Outstanding conditions for professional growth and development, work in a very fast paced and challenging environment;
  • Competitive salary based on the candidate's expectations and internal benchmark;
  • Medical insurance coverage for employees and family members, company fitness centre for employees and their spouse;
  • Kindergarten/school compensation program;
  • Company’s contribution to training & development;
  • Outstanding offices view;
  • Result oriented approach; flexible working conditions;
  • Corporate employee share scheme for all the employees.
